name: Sustainable Alternative Materials and Bio-Based Materials Summit, March 30-31 2022
content: The race is on to bioengineer carbon-neutral, recyclable, biodegradable, and affordable materials, with a growing number of mainstream brands committing to integrating sustainable materials into their product lines, establishing new relationships with bio-based material innovators leading to commercial growth within the sustainable goods sector. With next-generation bio-based alternatives reputed as the new frontier for sustainable materials, the 2nd Annual Sustainable Alternative and Bio-Based Materials Summit will showcase original technological advances and innovations powering the new wave of alternative materials, shaping a more sustainable fashion industry. Whether you have an innovative bio-based material or technology or are looking to integrate more sustainable and bio-based textiles into your apparel product lines, this virtual event will equip you with the information and partnerships to succeed.
